metadata.name: Spiritual Love
metadata.description: Niu Lang is a kind and handsome shepherd living on earth, and Zhi Nü is the weaver daughter of the goddess who is the queen of heaven. One day, Zhi Nü goes on a trip to the earth and meets Niu Lang. Impressed by Niu Lang's kindness, he falls in love with her and marries her. Later, the couple has two children. While the two were living happily on earth, the goddess, who learned that her daughter had married a shepherd, got very angry and took her daughter back to the sky. Niu Lang is very upset about this situation. He gets so upset that Niu Lang's ox begins to speak. He says that if he puts on his hide by killing him, he will be able to fly to heaven thanks to the hide. Thereupon, Niu Lang kills the ox and starts to fly to heaven wearing his skin. Realizing this situation, the Queen of Heaven draws a line between the two lovers with her buckle, just when they are about to meet with Zhi Nü, forming a big river and preventing them from meeting.
